attributes.action: People pay transportation costs according to size/weight
attributes.additional_details: More and more the average weight and size of people increases and, when travelling, the smaller ones bear the brunt of the larger, particulary the obese so why not introduce a system which works towards the charging people according to size or weight for transporting them..  Not a new idea but it could do with nationwide discussion.   Airlines charge for luggage (excess) by weight irrespectve of whether the owner of that specific peice of luggage is 7 or 2 stone
